_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

destinationID.title: Destination ID
destinationID.description: Unique Identifier for a destination instance

sourceNamespace.title: Source Namespace
sourceNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the source namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.

targetNamespace.title: Target Namespace
targetNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the target namespace.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: This field specifies if the destination has the target namespace mapped.

createTime.title: Create Time
createTime.description: The date and UTC time when the activation flow to the destination-namespace mapping was createdByID

createdByID.title: Created User ID
createdByID.description: ID of user who created the destination flow
